product_name: Black Diamond Super Rambla Insulated Gloves - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Sleek and built with the best materials available, the midweight Black Diamond Super Rambla Insulated Gloves provide incredible dexterity and unsurpassed protection from the elements. 100% waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX inserts with XCR product technology are guaranteed to keep your hands dry. Woven nylon shells have 4-way stretch for comfort and great dexterity. 142g PrimaLoft(R) One insulation and fixed 100g fleece lining keep your hands warm. Goat leather palms and fingers offer good grip. 3D patterning allows for maximum dexterity. Black Diamond Super Rambla Insulated Gloves include low-profile wrist straps and drawcord cuff closures. Closeout.
short_description: Sleek and built with the best materials available, the midweight Black Diamond Super Rambla Insulated Gloves provide incredible dexterity and unsurpassed protection from the elements.
